author: Alexander Osipovich
title: Nasdaq Sues IEX Over Stock-Exchange Technology Patents
text:
Nasdaq Inc. is suing stock-exchange operator IEX Group Inc. for alleged patent infringement, punching back at an upstart that is trying to challenge larger rivals.
The lawsuit accuses IEX of infringing seven of Nasdaqâ€™s patents for electronic-trading technology after the startup was founded in 2012, according to a copy of the lawsuit provided by Nasdaq to The Wall Street Journal.
IEX...
